amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the section of the bill that prohibits Federal Prison Industries and state prison industries from contracting for work to provide services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record on Wednesday, November 5, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
